author: cms-patatrack
body:
#### PR description:

Data formats and algorithms for the Pixel vertex reconstruction running on GPU.

#### PR validation:

Changes in use in the Patatrack releases.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Includes changes from:
  - cms-patatrack#158: Add new concurrent vertex algo
  - cms-patatrack#171: Introduce Cluster Charge Cut, optimize Histogram (bucket sorting)
  - cms-patatrack#177: Disable vertex reconstruction on GPU
  - cms-patatrack#180: Work around atomicAdd synchronisation problem on Volta
  - cms-patatrack#186: Suppress asserts in the GPU code, unless GPU_DEBUG is defined
  - cms-patatrack#202: Migrate tracker local reconstruction and pixel tracking to Tasks (backport #25163)
  - cms-patatrack#203: Address code style and quality issues
  - cms-patatrack#216: Full workflow from raw data to pixel tracks and vertices on GPUs
  - cms-patatrack#243: Fix initialization of gpuVertexFinder::Producer to avoid crash when cudaMalloc has not been called
  - cms-patatrack#251: Use std::nullptr_t instead of nullptr_t
  - cms-patatrack#252: Skip CUDA-related tests if no GPU is present
  - cms-patatrack#284: bugfix - change treatment of GPU tracks not on CPU
  - cms-patatrack#285: Various updates to pixel track/vertex DQM and MTV
  - cms-patatrack#314: Fix compilation errors under GCC 8
  - cms-patatrack#338: Clean up by clang-format
  - cms-patatrack#338: Rework the GPU pixel track clusterizer and vertex finder
  - cms-patatrack#347: Make track clustering algo for vertexing configurable
  - cms-patatrack#364: Move event and stream caches, and caching allocators out from CUDAService
  - cms-patatrack#384: Port the whole pixel workflow to new heterogeneous framework
  - cms-patatrack#385: Implement full Pixel SoA workflow on CPU
  - cms-patatrack#387: Fix clang warnings
  - cms-patatrack#389: Replace use of API wrapper stream and event with plain CUDA, part 1
  - cms-patatrack#390: Implement library-only wrappers for launching CUDA kernels
  - cms-patatrack#391: Synchronize event in the CUDAProductBase destructor
  - cms-patatrack#395: Replace CUDA API wrapper memory operations with native CUDA calls
  - cms-patatrack#396: Replace use of CUDA API wrapper unique_ptrs with CUDAUtilities unique_ptrs
  - cms-patatrack#408: Replace cuda::device operations with native CUDA calls
  - cms-patatrack#413: Implement GPU vertex finder with a single kernel
  - cms-patatrack#416: Drop obsolete heterogenous framework
  - cms-patatrack#419: Fix possible memory corruption in  gpuVertexFinder
  - cms-patatrack#423: Rename exitSansCUDADevices to requireCUDADevices
  - cms-patatrack#427: Apply code-format fixes
  - cms-patatrack#429: Implement changes from the CUDA framework review
  - cms-patatrack#442: Integrate the comments from the upstream PRs
  - cms-patatrack#446: Fix use of namespaces
  - cms-patatrack#499: Fix max track size in vertex SoA
  - cms-patatrack#548: Update the validation sequence for pixel-only tracking workflows
  - cms-patatrack#586: Simplify cudacompat layer to use a 1-dimensional grid
  - cms-patatrack#593: Clean up the pixel local reconstruction code
  - cms-patatrack#606: Clean up the pixel track reconstruction code
  - cms-patatrack#612: Address more review comments to the vertex finding code
  - cms-patatrack#613: Update include guards and include files in the pixel vertex reconstruction code
title: Patatrack integration - Pixel vertex reconstruction (11/N)
